price: 然后恶报乃作恶者的结局，因为他们否认安拉的迹象，而且加以嘲笑。
arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔواْ ٱلسُّوٓأَىٰٓ أَن كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَانُواْ بِهَا يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: thumma kāna ʿāqibata alladhīna asāū al-sūā an kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi wakānū bihā yastahziūna
